tool_description: Data-driven and transparent historical ESG scores for over 17,000 companies.

api_list.name: getHistoricalScoresByYear
api_list.description: This API returns historical Environmental, Social, Governance and Overall scores for companies on a scale of 0 to 100 based on the year provided in the request. It also provides other relevant metrics like Global Rank, Industry Rank, and more.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which historical scores are requested. Must be less than or equal to 2020.

optional_parameters.name: Content-Type
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the resource.

optional_parameters.name: sedol
optional_parameters.description: The SEDOL code for the company.

optional_parameters.name: isin
optional_parameters.description: The ISIN code for the company.

optional_parameters.name: companyname
optional_parameters.description: The name of the company for which scores are requested.
